remarks: The value of the preimage mapping operator can be restricted to preimages of subsets of RR. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2017.)
statement:
orrvccel.1 $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prob ) $.
orrvccel.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) ) $.
orrvccel.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
orrvcval4 $p |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC R A ) = ( `' X " { y e. RR | y R A } ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d R y $.
$d X y $.
